channel.title: General Travel Work Ruby Rails On on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Travel Work Ruby Rails On on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: holy butterball
item.description: I am back. i have been back since sunday night - it was a trip. I really liked san fran and i really liked hanging with noah and the gravity guys. Nice. The office was super class and they are doing such cool stuff. I stayed in this dope hotel and ate at really nice places. So now i am working on some stuff. It is really fun. I really like RoR.
